title: U2 - Children Of The Revolution...The First Recordings 1978 - 79
description:
U2 - Children Of The Revolution...The First Recordings 1978 - 1979

Some years ago I found a stash of U2 boots in a second hand record shop in South London...needless to say I bought the lot at about a fiver a disc/ Â£7 for doubles...incredible?


CD > EAC > Traders Little Helper > Flac8 sector aligned


First Demo : Keystone Studios, Dublin...April 1978

01 - Street Mission
02 - Shadows And Tall Trees
03 - The Fool

The Second Demo : Eamon Andrews Studios, Dublin...December 1978

04 - Lost On A Distant Planet
05 - Twilight
06 - Another Time Another Place
07 - All In The Light

The Third Demo : Eamon Andrews Studios, Dublin...May 1979

08 - 11 o'clock Tick Tock
09 - Touch
10 - Another Day
11 - The Dream Is Over
12 - Out Of Control
13 - Boy Girl
14 - Stories For Boys
15 - A Day Without Me

Bonus Tracks : Tracks 16 - 18 Missed as officially released.

19 - I Will Follow (Hamburg Riot Show 1981)
20 - Trash Trampoline And The Party Girl (Out-Take 1980)
21 - Two Hearts Beat As One (Alternate Late 1982)
22 - Glad To See You (Ramones cover...Cork Opera House 10th May 1979)
